entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
